The Automation Spectrum

Automation is critical for scaling, but not all tools are compliant. This guide shows the risk levels associated with different automation methods for your promotional ecosystem.

LOW RISK: Compliant & Recommended

Tools for automating tasks **external** to OnlyFans. Use these to build your promotional funnel safely.

Zapier/n8n.io: Automate cross-platform posting (Twitter, IG).

Email Parsing: Trigger alerts from OF notifications.

Native Scheduler: Queue content directly on OF.

HIGH RISK: Violation of Terms

Tools that automate actions **inside** OnlyFans. These can lead to account suspension or a permanent ban.

Browser Bots (Selenium): Mimic user actions. Easily detectable.

Unofficial API Wrappers: Reverse-engineered APIs. High security and compliance risk.
